group_1.textCenter: Hey, Asahi, Ryoko, this Hall o' Ween thing...@What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Halloween? That's out of nowhere...

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, now that you mention it,@this city's real into Halloween.

group_1.textLeft: Ya'll must get lonely with all these things ya@don't know about, huh!

group_1.textRight: I didn't say that, but... I just want to learn...@All these various new things.

group_1.textLeft: Hm, that ambition is a good trait to have.
Though, if you wanna learn about something like@that, you might wanna ask Chiharu or Sunao...

group_1.textRight: That's just the thing... I wanted to hold a secret@Hall o' Ween gathering for the two of them.
If I prepared it all by myself, surely they would@be surprised, right?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, you mean a Halloween party!

group_1.textRight: Oh, that'd be sweet!

group_1.textLeft: Then allow me to give a brief rundown of@what Halloween is...

group_1.textRight: Umm, so in short...@It's kind of like Obon?

group_1.textLeft: If you wanna get down to the nitty-gritty, then@season-wise, you'd be closer calling it Ohigan.
Well...Halloween and Ohigan...aren't very@different at their core.

group_1.textRight: If it's like Ohigan...then it's also about@mourning the deceased, right?
Since so many were injured or killed during@the previous battle...

group_1.textLeft: But hey, what matters is havin' some fun, yeah?
'Cause even during Bon, ya get to enjoy the Bon@Festival dance while grievin' the dead, right?

group_1.textRight: That's true...and Obon does have such delicious@fruits associated with it.

group_1.textLeft: That is quite true. While the original purpose@is important...
The heart of the festival is your feelings towards@mourning the dead, not the formalities of it all.

group_1.textRight: I see... I understand now.
Then I shall hold my own Hall o' Ween party@at the Suitoku Temple!

group_1.textLeft: Heck yeah!

group_1.textCenter: (Although...a Halloween celebration at the@temple... That will be quite the oddity...)

group_1.textRight: Did you really put all this together by@yourself, Shizuka?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, though I was given some advice from@Asahi and Ryoko.
I also borrowed some things here and there@in the temple from the Chief Priest.

group_1.textRight: Shizuka learned about Halloween...@It's like she's grown a little.
Having it at the temple was a surprise, but@this turned out lovely!

group_1.textLeft: Ohh, you did so well preparing for this.

group_1.textRight: I knew it would be impossible to get costumes@on such short notice, though.

group_1.textLeft: It's a little embarrassing to be the only one@here who dressed up.

group_1.textRight: Nonsense, that costume matches you so well.@A hawk...was it?

group_1.textLeft: Correct, a fitting costume for a sniper like me,@wouldn't you say?
Sasha and her friends tailored it for me.

group_1.textRight: Y'know, this's kinda like a Japanese-style@Halloween.
Wagashi and fruit platters for Higan...
And Bon lanterns instead of jack-o-lanterns!
...Is it weird?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, I friggin' love it. It's like a cool blend of@Japanese and Western styles.
Yes, a Halloween appropriate for@the Tokime Clan.
Now we just need to get a Bon dance goin' and@we'll be golden!

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* Of course! I'll teach you the Tokime@folk songs passed down from the head family!

group_1.textLeft: Halloween is getting washed away by Ohigan@little by little...
I mean, bringing out Bon dances will make this@even more chaotic than it already is!

group_1.textRight: Chiharu, Sunao, Chika! Let's all dance!

group_1.textLeft: Tokime folk songs?!@Let's get some music going!

group_1.textRight: This should be my first time hearing such@a melody, yet I feel nostalgic...

group_1.textCenter: We used to dance with our grandmothers@to this. *Giggle*
...Ah, for goodness' sake.@Well, it IS pleasant...

group_1.textRight: Man, now that was fun.

group_1.textLeft: Heh heh, indeed it was.
Everyone seems to have worn themselves out@to the point of falling asleep.
Causing such a ruckus while we were mourning@the dead... I'm sure we'll be reprimanded.

group_1.textRight: It's all good. It'll let our ancestors know we're@doin' well.

group_1.textLeft: If Ryoko herself says so, then that gives me@some peace of mind.

group_1.textRight: ...Hey, buddy.
In Futatsugi City you saw them, didn't you?@Those guys who died.

group_1.textLeft: ...I did.

group_1.textRight: ...Was she over there? Y'know...Sa...
...Nothing, forget it. I've made up my mind.
I promised I'd go see her myself when I arrive@at the Pure Land.
Knowing her, she'll come tell me herself@one day.

group_1.textLeft: ...Is that so.

group_1.textRight: ...That sure was fun, havin' a Shizuka-style@Halloween.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, perhaps we should do it again next year.
